patthana4.8:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:2.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:3.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:6.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:7.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.8:14.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto araṇo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.8:18.1_0: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:21.1_0: Vipākaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:59.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:59.1_1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:59.1_2: Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo ca avitakkavicāramatto saraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:60.1_0: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.8:81.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:84.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.8:88.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.8:100.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:102.1_0: Ācayagāmī araṇo dhammo ācayagāmissa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:106.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.8:112.1_0: Asekkhaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:116.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:118.1_0: Sekkho araṇo dhammo sekkhassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:119.1_0: Asekkho araṇo dhammo asekkhassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:145.1_0: Paṇītaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paṇīto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:147.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.8:157.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:168.1_0: Maggahetuko araṇo ca maggādhipati araṇo ca dhammā maggahetukassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.8:174.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:175.1_0: Paccuppanno saraṇo dhammo paccuppannassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:176.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:177.1_0: Paccuppanno araṇo dhammo paccuppannassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:180.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:181.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:182.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:185.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:186.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:187.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:190.1_0: Atītārammaṇo araṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:191.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo araṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:192.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo araṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:193.1_0: Atītārammaṇo araṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:196.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:197.1_0: Bahiddhā saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:200.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:201.1_0: Bahiddhā araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:204.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:205.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:208.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:209.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:212.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:213.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana4.8:216.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭigho araṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
